data: `minecraft:tamemount` allows the Entity to be tamed by mounting it.

data.Name: attempt_temper_mod
data.Description: The amount the entity's temper will increase when mounted.

data.Name: autoRejectItems
data.Description: The list of items that, if carried while interacting with the entity, will anger it.

data.Name: feed_items
data.Description: The list of items that can be used to increase the entity's temper and speed up the taming process.

data.Name: feed_text
data.Description: The text that shows in the feeding interact button.

data.Name: max_temper
data.Description: The maximum value for the entity's random starting temper.

data.Name: min_temper
data.Description: The minimum value for the entity's random starting temper.

data.Name: ride_text
data.Description: The text that shows in the riding interact button.

data.Name: tame_event
data.Description: Event that triggers when the entity becomes tamed.

data: `autoRejectItems` is a JSON Object defined by one parameter. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: item
data.Description: Name of the item this entity dislikes and will cause it to get angry if used while untamed.

data: `feed_items` is a JSON Object defined by one parameter. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: item
data.Description: Name of the item this entity likes and can be used to increase this entity's temper.
